Table of Contents

Name

wvDVI - convert msword documents to DVI

Synopsis

wvPS in_word_doc out_dvi_doc

Description

wvDVI converts word documents into DVI documents.

Requirements

wvLatex latex

More Information

http://wvware.sourceforge.net

See Also

wvAbw(1) , wvWare(1) , wvHtml(1) , wvLatex(1) , wvCleanLatex(1) , wvPDF(1) , wvPS(1) , wvText(1) , wvWml(1) , wvMime(1) , catdoc(1) , word2x(1)

Author

Dom Lachowicz (current author and maintainer)
WEB: http://wvware.sourceforge.net
MAIL: cinamod@hotmail.com
